Orlando’s Best
Private Event Venue
Whether You Know Exactly What You Want or Need Help Crafting the Details, Our Professional Event Planners Will Work With You to Create a Fully Customized Experience.
Let Us Help You Create Something Extraordinary
RESERVE YOUR EVENT
Your event is easy as 1, 2, 3
Select your space
Find the perfect area to match your event size and vibe.
Build your perfect menu
Craft a food and drink lineup your guests will love.
Customize your experience
Tailor the décor, layout, and extras to fit your vision.
Select your space
Find the perfect area to match your event size and vibe.
Build your perfect menu
Craft a food and drink lineup your guests will love.
Customize your experience
Tailor the décor, layout, and extras to fit your vision.
Select Your Space in the Heart of Orlando
Choose from a variety of flexible spaces designed to host events of any size. Whether you’re planning a corporate gathering after a convention at the Orange County Convention Center or a lively watch party before the game at Amway Center, we’ll help you find the perfect setting to match your vibe in downtown Orlando.
Venue Specifications
Venue Capacity

Build your perfect menu
A Custom Menu, Just the Way You Want It In Orlando
From Tom’s Famous Favorites to Custom Sushi Stations and everything in between, we’ll help you craft a menu that perfectly fits your event. Whether you’re planning a buffet, chef-attended stations, passed appetizers, or plated meals, our team delivers some of the best event catering in Orlando. Pair it all with signature cocktails or custom-crafted drinks—think citrus-infused spritzes, tropical rum blends, and other Orlando-inspired favorites—designed just for your group. No matter the style, no matter the flavor—your perfect menu starts here.
Dietary Options Available
Vegetarian
Vegan
Gluten-Free
Customize your experience
Make the event your own, right near Orlando’s SoDo District. From personalized décor and custom seating layouts to A/V setups and special touches, our event specialists will help tailor every detail to reflect your unique style and purpose.

Let’s Celebrate Together
Celebrate life’s biggest moments with your loved ones in an exciting, high-energy setting—where unforgettable memories are made for the events that matter most.

Your Orlando Event Planner, Every Step of the Way
Whether you’re organizing a private celebration near I‑Drive or a corporate gathering after the Orange County Convention Center, our local event specialists are here to help with every detail. Schedule a 30-minute consultation to start planning with confidence.
Anne Marie Case
Vice President Event Sales
407.724.2711
acase@tomswatchbar.com
Start of Meetings Embed Script
End of Meetings Embed Script
Orlando’s Venue For Every Occasion
From Corporate Gatherings to Orlando Celebrations and Private Watch Parties, we’re ready to host your event with configurable indoor and outdoor spaces offering beautiful views of Orlando’s skyline.
Orlando Corporate Events
Orlando Networking Event Venue
Sports Events
Conference & Workshop Venue in Orlando
Best Place to Host Social Gatherings
Orlando Corporate Events
Orlando Corporate Events
Host a productive and memorable corporate event just off International Drive, perfect for company holiday parties, team building, client presentations, and team meetings. With state-of-the-art A/V technology, customizable event spaces, and chef-driven menus, we create a professional yet fun atmosphere for your group. Our experienced event planners will tailor every detail to help you achieve your business goals with ease.
Orlando Networking Event Venue
Orlando Networking Event Venue
Create meaningful connections right in the heart of Orlando. Our flexible event spaces and high-energy atmosphere are ideal for networking mixers, industry meetups, and professional gatherings near W Sand Lake Rd, Creative Village, and Downtown Orlando. With customizable layouts and Orlando-inspired craft cocktails, your event will feel effortless, engaging, and uniquely local.
Sports Events
Sports Event
Take your sports viewing to the next level—Orlando style. Whether you’re planning a fantasy football draft, a college game day watch party, or an alumni gathering for UCF, Rollins, or Valencia fans, our immersive A/V setup and flexible spaces deliver an unforgettable experience. From football Sundays to rivalry weekends, bring your crew together and cheer on your team just minutes from W Sand Lake Rd and I‑Drive.
Conference & Workshop Venue in Orlando
Conference & Workshop Venue in Orlando
Host your next conference event or workshop in a space that blends professionalism with Orlando energy. Located near top venues like the Orange County Convention Center and major hotels such as the Hyatt Regency Orlando, Rosen Centre, and Hilton Orlando, our venue offers high-tech A/V systems, customizable layouts, and chef-driven menus. Whether it’s a breakout session, post-conference mixer, or private workshop, Tom’s Watch Bar ensures your event is engaging, seamless, and successful.
Best Place to Host Social Gatherings
Best Place to Host Social Gatherings
Celebrate life’s big moments in the heart of Orlando.
Whether you’re hosting a birthday bash, wedding after-party, fantasy football draft, or private watch party, our versatile spaces and immersive viewing experience set the vibe. Located near Orlando’s trendiest districts like Ivanhoe Village, Mills 50, and Creative Village, we’re a go-to destination for social groups, alumni clubs, and locals looking to make their next gathering unforgettable.
Private Event FAQs
–
Where can I host a private event in Orlando?
Tom’s Watch Bar in Orlando offers the perfect venue for a wide range of private events, from corporate gatherings and networking mixers to sports watch parties, professional conferences, birthday celebrations, weddings, and holiday parties. Located near popular destinations like International Drive and the Orange County Convention Center, our flexible event spaces can accommodate groups of all sizes and styles. With tailored services, customizable menus, and state-of-the-art A/V capabilities, Tom’s Watch Bar ensures your private event is both memorable and effortless to plan.
+
How far in advance should I book my event?
For the best availability at our Orlando location—especially during busy times like holiday seasons, major sports events at the Amway Center, or conventions at the Orange County Convention Center—we recommend booking as early as possible. Our dedicated private event planner is here to help you check availability and secure your date, ensuring your event is seamless and memorable.
+
Which Orlando venues have outdoor spaces for private events?
Tom’s Watch Bar in Orlando features multiple patios that are perfect for private events, offering a refreshing outdoor experience. Enjoy great views of the Orlando skyline and stunning sunsets while hosting your gathering in a vibrant yet comfortable setting. Our outdoor spaces are ideal for everything from casual celebrations to professional mixers, making your event truly memorable.
+
What are popular venues for networking events in Orlando?
When it comes to networking events in Orlando, Tom’s Watch Bar stands out as the premier venue. With its flexible event spaces, vibrant atmosphere, and customizable layouts, it’s the ideal spot for mixers, industry meetups, and professional gatherings. Located near key areas like Creative Village and downtown Orlando, Tom’s Watch Bar offers a great combination of local flavor, craft cocktails, and state-of-the-art amenities to ensure your networking event is both productive and unforgettable.
+
How much does it cost to rent a private event space in Orlando?
The cost to rent a private event space in Orlando varies depending on your event size, space selection, and specific needs. At Tom’s Watch Bar, we offer multiple flexible spaces and customizable packages designed to fit a variety of budgets. Our private event planner is ready to work with you to tailor the perfect setup and menu that aligns with your vision and budget. Contact us today to discuss your event details and get a personalized quote.
+
Where can I host my company holiday party in Orlando?
Tom’s Watch Bar is one of the best venues in Orlando to host your company holiday party. Conveniently located near W Sand Lake Road, International Drive, and Kirkman Road, we offer flexible event spaces customizable for groups of all sizes. Enjoy premium food options—from chef-driven menus to custom sushi stations—paired perfectly with craft cocktails. Plus, elevate your celebration with live music or DJ options to keep the energy high. Whether you’re planning a festive cocktail party, sit-down dinner, or lively holiday celebration, our private event planners will help design an unforgettable experience tailored to your company’s style.
+
What parking and transportation options are available for our guests?
Guests attending events at Tom’s Watch Bar in Orlando will find convenient parking options nearby. There is a dedicated parking lot on-site, plus ample street parking available along W Sand Lake Road and International Drive. Valet parking services may also be offered for larger events—check with our event team for availability. For those using public transportation, several Lynx bus routes serve the area, making it easy to reach the venue. Rideshare services like Uber and Lyft are widely available and offer a quick, hassle-free option for arriving and departing from the venue.
+
Where can I host a hybrid or virtual event in Orlando?
Tom’s Watch Bar is the perfect venue in Orlando for hybrid or virtual events. Whether you’re hosting a fantasy football draft with friends across the country or coordinating a corporate event connecting multiple locations and satellite offices, our advanced live-streaming capabilities and flexible event spaces create a seamless, integrated experience. Our expert A/V team ensures every participant—near or remote—feels fully engaged and part of the event.

Private Event FAQs
–
Where can I host a private event in Orlando?
Tom’s Watch Bar in Orlando offers the perfect venue for a wide range of private events, from corporate gatherings and networking mixers to sports watch parties, professional conferences, birthday celebrations, weddings, and holiday parties. Located near popular destinations like International Drive and the Orange County Convention Center, our flexible event spaces can accommodate groups of all sizes and styles. With tailored services, customizable menus, and state-of-the-art A/V capabilities, Tom’s Watch Bar ensures your private event is both memorable and effortless to plan.
+
How far in advance should I book my event?
For the best availability at our Orlando location—especially during busy times like holiday seasons, major sports events at the Amway Center, or conventions at the Orange County Convention Center—we recommend booking as early as possible. Our dedicated private event planner is here to help you check availability and secure your date, ensuring your event is seamless and memorable.
+
Which Orlando venues have outdoor spaces for private events?
Tom’s Watch Bar in Orlando features multiple patios that are perfect for private events, offering a refreshing outdoor experience. Enjoy great views of the Orlando skyline and stunning sunsets while hosting your gathering in a vibrant yet comfortable setting. Our outdoor spaces are ideal for everything from casual celebrations to professional mixers, making your event truly memorable.
+
What are popular venues for networking events in Orlando?
When it comes to networking events in Orlando, Tom’s Watch Bar stands out as the premier venue. With its flexible event spaces, vibrant atmosphere, and customizable layouts, it’s the ideal spot for mixers, industry meetups, and professional gatherings. Located near key areas like Creative Village and downtown Orlando, Tom’s Watch Bar offers a great combination of local flavor, craft cocktails, and state-of-the-art amenities to ensure your networking event is both productive and unforgettable.
+
How much does it cost to rent a private event space in Orlando?
The cost to rent a private event space in Orlando varies depending on your event size, space selection, and specific needs. At Tom’s Watch Bar, we offer multiple flexible spaces and customizable packages designed to fit a variety of budgets. Our private event planner is ready to work with you to tailor the perfect setup and menu that aligns with your vision and budget. Contact us today to discuss your event details and get a personalized quote.
+
Where can I host my company holiday party in Orlando?
Tom’s Watch Bar is one of the best venues in Orlando to host your company holiday party. Conveniently located near W Sand Lake Road, International Drive, and Kirkman Road, we offer flexible event spaces customizable for groups of all sizes. Enjoy premium food options—from chef-driven menus to custom sushi stations—paired perfectly with craft cocktails. Plus, elevate your celebration with live music or DJ options to keep the energy high. Whether you’re planning a festive cocktail party, sit-down dinner, or lively holiday celebration, our private event planners will help design an unforgettable experience tailored to your company’s style.
+
What parking and transportation options are available for our guests?
Guests attending events at Tom’s Watch Bar in Orlando will find convenient parking options nearby. There is a dedicated parking lot on-site, plus ample street parking available along W Sand Lake Road and International Drive. Valet parking services may also be offered for larger events—check with our event team for availability. For those using public transportation, several Lynx bus routes serve the area, making it easy to reach the venue. Rideshare services like Uber and Lyft are widely available and offer a quick, hassle-free option for arriving and departing from the venue.
+
Where can I host a hybrid or virtual event in Orlando?
Tom’s Watch Bar is the perfect venue in Orlando for hybrid or virtual events. Whether you’re hosting a fantasy football draft with friends across the country or coordinating a corporate event connecting multiple locations and satellite offices, our advanced live-streaming capabilities and flexible event spaces create a seamless, integrated experience. Our expert A/V team ensures every participant—near or remote—feels fully engaged and part of the event.
